name: Right Path
description:
Right Path

Test your mental power and focus with this tricky game I have only one advice for you don't trust the signs they will play you in every turn you have to follow the right path or you will be stuck for ever 

only the most focused player can finish all the game !!

why this game was made 

the game was made for a game jam with the theme being the game is a liar hosted by Brackeys and took a way to upload here hope you enjoy it
